description:
A tubeless ready version of a Vittoria classic. The Corsa is a fast and efficient road tire that doesn't ask for compromises. The introduction of Graphene 2.0 in the rubber compound gives them great grip, durability and resistance to wear.

  • TLR (Tubeless Ready) lets you ditch tubes for reduced weight and more pressure flexibility
  • 320tpi cotton casing for an incredibly supple ride
  • 4 different rubber compounds provide optimal performance
  • Graphene 2.0 blended with the rubber for speed, grip, durability and puncture resistance
name: Vittoria Corsa G2.0 TLR Folding Tire
